answer:
QUESTION
Bissmilla ir Rehmaan er Raheem, Assalaam o alaikum I dreamt of having sex with a lady then the ladies face changes to my sisters as I am surprised in the dream I actually/really wake up. The next day I dreamt a man I know comes to my (house) door and his face has blood on it. I assume (whilst dreaming) that he had a fight at home --- On these two days (dream 1 & 2) I went to sleep after fajr salah, but before sunrise (does that affect the dream?) Also a couple of days later I dreamt being made feel good, comfortable and satisfied whilst like sitting with a beautiful young girl/lady who I don?t know. I was in physical contact with her e.g. possibly my leg and hers were touching but nothing like ie sex was involved. I had this dream (number 3) when I went to sleep after sunrise but before mid-day.
ANSWER


Share:
All the dreams have no significance. When you see an evil dream, recite
laa -howla-wa-laa-quwwata-illah-billahi. Inshallah the dreams will have no
effect.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
